Job Overview:Life Science People is partnered with a digital health company seeking a Director of Machine Learning to lead their data science and machine learning efforts. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in health tech or life sciences and will be responsible for developing and implementing machine learning models that improve patient outcomes and optimize clinical workflows.Responsibilities:Lead a team of data scientists and machine learning engineers to develop and deploy machine learning models that drive business outcomesDevelop and execute a data strategy that enables the organization to leverage data effectivelyCollaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for machine learning and data-driven insightsDevelop and implement best practices for data governance, data quality, and data privacyCommunicate results and insights to stakeholders across the organizationRequirements:PhD or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, or related fieldsAt least 7 years of experience in data science or machine learning roles, with a focus on healthcare or life sciencesProven experience leading machine learning projects from ideation to deploymentStrong understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as deep learning, reinforcement learning, and natural language processingExperience with data processing, data warehousing, and data modelingStrong communication and leadership skills
